<title>Live in New York City | Bruce Springsteen</title>
<meta name="description" content="Recorded at Madison Square Garden on the final two nights of the E Street Band’s 1999-2000 Reunion tour, this two-disc live set documents a classic E Street outing." />
<meta name="robots" content="index, follow, max-snippet:-1, max-image-preview:large, max-video-preview:-1" />
<link rel="canonical" href="https://brucespringsteen.net/albums/live-in-new-york-city/" />
<meta property="og:locale" content="en_US" />
<meta property="og:type" content="article" />
<meta property="og:title" content="Live in New York City" />
<meta property="og:description" content="Recorded at Madison Square Garden on the final two nights of the E Street Band’s 1999-2000 Reunion tour, this two-disc live set documents a classic E Street outing. Included are the first-ever live releases of “Prove It All Night” and “Jungleland,” as well as new songs “American Skin (41 Shots)” and “Land of Hope and Dreams.”" />
<meta property="og:url" content="https://brucespringsteen.net/albums/live-in-new-york-city/" />
<meta property="og:site_name" content="Bruce Springsteen" />

	<meta property="og:image:width" content="1200" />
	<meta property="og:image:height" content="630" />
	<meta property="og:image:type" content="image/jpeg" />
<meta name="twitter:card" content="summary_large_image" />
<meta name="twitter:title" content="Live in New York City" />
<meta name="twitter:description" content="Recorded at Madison Square Garden on the final two nights of the E Street Band’s 1999-2000 Reunion tour, this two-disc live set documents a classic E Street outing. Included are the first-ever live releases of “Prove It All Night” and “Jungleland,” as well as new songs “American Skin (41 Shots)” and “Land of Hope and Dreams.”" />
<meta name="twitter:image" content="https://cdn-p.smehost.net/sites/e8622626f9584d40b1a8fce8dfa6f567/wp-content/uploads/2001/03/og-springsteen-livenyc-front.jpg" />
<meta name="twitter:site" content="@springsteen" />

yoast_head_json.title: Live in New York City | Bruce Springsteen
yoast_head_json.description: Recorded at Madison Square Garden on the final two nights of the E Street Band’s 1999-2000 Reunion tour, this two-disc live set documents a classic E Street outing.
yoast_head_json.og_description: Recorded at Madison Square Garden on the final two nights of the E Street Band’s 1999-2000 Reunion tour, this two-disc live set documents a classic E Street outing. Included are the first-ever live releases of “Prove It All Night” and “Jungleland,” as well as new songs “American Skin (41 Shots)” and “Land of Hope and Dreams.”
yoast_head_json.twitter_description: Recorded at Madison Square Garden on the final two nights of the E Street Band’s 1999-2000 Reunion tour, this two-disc live set documents a classic E Street outing. Included are the first-ever live releases of “Prove It All Night” and “Jungleland,” as well as new songs “American Skin (41 Shots)” and “Land of Hope and Dreams.”
